data.text:
A few days after Mejiro McQueen's amazing 
victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.
data.processed:
<story>A few days after Mejiro McQueen's amazing 
<story>victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.

data.text:
The situation revolving around our weak, one 
member team changed in an instant.
data.processed:
<story>The situation revolving around our weak, one 
<story>member team changed in an instant.

data.text:
McQueen-san, the way you run is so mesmerizing! 
I look forward to working with you!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>McQueen-san, the way you run is so mesmerizing! 
<story>I look forward to working with you!

data.text:
Gasp… I'm so… Proud of your accomplishments… 
Uuh… It's was so… moving…
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Gasp… I'm so… Proud of your accomplishments… 
<story>Uuh… It's was so… moving…

data.text: Th-Thank you…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Th-Thank you…

data.text:
I'm going to do my best to make sure my dreams 
come true just like you, McQueen-chan!
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed:
<story>I'm going to do my best to make sure my dreams 
<story>come true just like you, McQueen-chan!

data.text: Y-Yes… Good luck.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Y-Yes… Good luck.

data.text:
It seems like they've all been charmed 
by the way you run, McQueen.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It seems like they've all been charmed 
<story>by the way you run, McQueen.

data.text: Um… It's kind of embarrassing…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Um… It's kind of embarrassing…

data.text: Trainer-san, what was my time?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, what was my time?

data.text: 6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!

data.text: 6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>6 furlongs in about 80 seconds! I have no complaints!

data.text:
Amazing! Those are the legs of the 
winner of the Spring Tennō Shō!
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed:
<story>Amazing! Those are the legs of the 
<story>winner of the Spring Tennō Shō!

data.text: J-Jeez… Please stop that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>J-Jeez… Please stop that.

data.text:
That being said, it's been quite some time since I've been able 
to train with others. I've truly missed it.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That being said, it's been quite some time since I've been able 
<story>to train with others. I've truly missed it.

data.text: This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.

data.text: This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>This is all thanks to your victory in the Spring Tennō Shō.

data.text: Winning really turned things around for us, didn't it…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Winning really turned things around for us, didn't it…

data.text:
Anyways, now we are one step closer to being 
recognized as a full-fledged team!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, now we are one step closer to being 
<story>recognized as a full-fledged team!

data.text: McQueen-san, could you teach me about proper running form?
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>McQueen-san, could you teach me about proper running form?

data.text: Of course, I don't mind one bit.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Of course, I don't mind one bit.

data.text:
McQueen-san, could you teach me how to 
properly exit the starting gate?
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>McQueen-san, could you teach me how to 
<story>properly exit the starting gate?

data.text: There's a trick to that. Here, let me show you.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>There's a trick to that. Here, let me show you.

data.text: McQueen, I'm hungry! Treat me to some carrot cake!
data.processed: <story>McQueen, I'm hungry! Treat me to some carrot cake!

data.text: I'll get you one as soon as possible.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I'll get you one as soon as possible.

data.text:
Wait… Who said that!? Who is trying to 
take advantage of the situation!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Wait… Who said that!? Who is trying to 
<story>take advantage of the situation!?

data.text: It's me, it's me! Yo, McQueen!
data.processed: <story>It's me, it's me! Yo, McQueen!

data.text: G-Gold Ship-san…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>G-Gold Ship-san…

data.text:
You could say she's someone I know… but it's more like I 
constantly get involved with her for whatever reason…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>You could say she's someone I know… but it's more like I 
<story>constantly get involved with her for whatever reason…

data.text: I watched your race during the Spring Tennō Shō! It was amazing!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>I watched your race during the Spring Tennō Shō! It was amazing!

data.text:
Especially when you took the enemies' attack to 
protect your friends! I'll never forget it.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Especially when you took the enemies' attack to 
<story>protect your friends! I'll never forget it.

data.text:
I never did anything of the sort! And what do you 
even mean by the enemies' attacks anyways!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I never did anything of the sort! And what do you 
<story>even mean by the enemies' attacks anyways!?

data.text:
Hey now, don't sweat the small stuff! Anyways, that was an 
amazing race. It was really moving.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hey now, don't sweat the small stuff! Anyways, that was an 
<story>amazing race. It was really moving.

data.text: And that's why I came here! To see more of your amazingness!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>And that's why I came here! To see more of your amazingness!

data.text:
I see no issue with you just watching, 
however… please don't get in my way.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I see no issue with you just watching, 
<story>however… please don't get in my way.

data.text:
Okay okay! I'll sit quietly and watch, so 
there's no need to worry about that.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Okay okay! I'll sit quietly and watch, so 
<story>there's no need to worry about that.

data.text:
Okay everyone, look over here! McQueen is about 
to show off her true power! To start with, she'll 
eat some nigiri sushi with lots of wasabi!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Okay everyone, look over here! McQueen is about 
<story>to show off her true power! To start with, she'll 
<story>eat some nigiri sushi with lots of wasabi!

data.text: I won't be doing that!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I won't be doing that!!

data.text: Haa… Today was so exhausting…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Haa… Today was so exhausting…

data.text: You're probably still exhausted from the Tennō Shō…
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>You're probably still exhausted from the Tennō Shō…

data.text:
Do you have no self-awareness? I'm exhausted because you were 
involved/because of you. Jeez…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Do you have no self-awareness? I'm exhausted because you were 
<story>involved/because of you. Jeez…

data.text:
But what she said is right. That race was not too 
long ago, so let's take it easy for now.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But what she said is right. That race was not too 
<story>long ago, so let's take it easy for now.

data.text:
I agree, but we mustn't lose sight 
of the upcoming races either…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I agree, but we mustn't lose sight 
<story>of the upcoming races either…

data.text:
Even though I won the Tennō Shō, I've still 
got plenty of races left to do.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Even though I won the Tennō Shō, I've still 
<story>got plenty of races left to do.

data.text:
Wow, despite achieving your goal you're 
just as motivated as ever.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Wow, despite achieving your goal you're 
<story>just as motivated as ever.

data.text:
Well of course. There is no limit to the number of honours that 
the Mejiro Family can be graced with.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Well of course. There is no limit to the number of honours that 
<story>the Mejiro Family can be graced with.

data.text: Plus I have a responsibility to liven up this team as well.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Plus I have a responsibility to liven up this team as well.

data.text: Are you being serious…?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Are you being serious…?

data.text:
Of course I am being serious! Why would 
I mess around now of all times!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Of course I am being serious! Why would 
<story>I mess around now of all times!?

data.text: Hehe… I'm glad to see you're still excited to be running.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hehe… I'm glad to see you're still excited to be running.

data.text:
Alrighty then, I've decided to join this team! A new member has 
joined, make sure to welcome them!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Alrighty then, I've decided to join this team! A new member has 
<story>joined, make sure to welcome them!

data.text: Huh…!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Huh…!?

data.text:
Thanks to the success of Mejiro McQueen, plenty of things 
happened in quick succession, and with this many members…

choices.text: We won't have to break up the team!
We won't have to break up the team!

data.processed:
<story>Thanks to the success of Mejiro McQueen, plenty of things 
<story>happened in quick succession, and with this many members…

data.text:
That's great, congrats! Although I have 
no idea what you're talking about…!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>That's great, congrats! Although I have 
<story>no idea what you're talking about…!

data.text: Will this team really be okay…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Will this team really be okay…?

data.text:
This team may have been hastily assembled, but I 
have confidence that this team will be great.
data.processed:
<story>This team may have been hastily assembled, but I 
<story>have confidence that this team will be great.

data.text:
This team may have been hastily assembled, but I 
have confidence that this team will be great.
data.processed:
<story>This team may have been hastily assembled, but I 
<story>have confidence that this team will be great.

data.text: Because at the center of this team is Mejiro McQueen.
data.processed: <story>Because at the center of this team is Mejiro McQueen.

data.text: Okay Team McQueen, let's set sail!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Okay Team McQueen, let's set sail!
